short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Retrieve post IDs, creator IDs and direct bookmarkable links to posts in Facebook

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Click the icon to expose links to posts in Facebook. Each displayed link is composed of the creator ID and post ID. Each link opens in a new tab and can be bookmarked. 

Click again to hide the links.

The extension is free and open source.
